# AVSpeechSynthesisProviderAudioUnit

**Class**

An object that generates speech from text.

## Declaration

```swift
class AVSpeechSynthesisProviderAudioUnit
```

## Overview

Use a speech synthesizer audio unit to generate audio buffers that contain speech for a given voice and speech markup. The audio unit receives an [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVSpeechSynthesisProviderRequest] as input, and extracts audio buffers through the render block.

Use [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVSpeechSynthesisProviderAudioUnit/speechSynthesisOutputMetadataBlock] to provide metadata as an array of [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVSpeechSynthesisMarker].

The system scans and loads voices for audio unit extensions of this type, and the voices it provides are available for use in [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVSpeechSynthesizer] and accessibility technologies like VoiceOver and Speak Screen.



## Rendering speech

- **synthesizeSpeechRequest(_:)**: Sets the text to synthesize and the voice to use.
- **AVSpeechSynthesisProviderRequest**: An object that represents the text to synthesize and the voice to use.

## Supplying metadata

- **AVSpeechSynthesisProviderOutputBlock**: A type that represents the method for sending marker information to the host.
- **speechSynthesisOutputMetadataBlock**: A block that subclasses use to send marker information to the host.
- **AVSpeechSynthesisMarker**: An object that contains information about the synthesized audio.

## Getting and setting voices

- **speechVoices**: A list of voices the audio unit provides to the system.
- **AVSpeechSynthesisProviderVoice**: An object that represents a voice that an audio unit provides to its host.

## Cancelling a request

- **cancelSpeechRequest()**: Informs the audio unit to discard the speech request.

## Inherits From

- AUAudioUnit

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
